name: WeirdCat Dating Sim!
description:
Welcome to the WeirdCat Dating Sim! In this game, you live in the town Narlus with your childhood friend WeirdCat. With each day you've spent with her, you've felt your feelings for her progress from friend to potential lover. Will you choose to confess your love and live the rest of your life in happiness, or will you end up in a downward spiral of depression and loneliness? Find out by playing!

Game inspired by @/WeirdCatHQ on twitter. Without them, I wouldn't where be where I am right now
